protocol.name: P-GSE40322-2
protocol.text: 10-day-old wild type (Col-0), cpr5, sim smr1 and cpr5 sim smr1. Replicates are derived from three independent biological experiments.

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings were grown at 21-24Â°C, 16-hour day length, 60% relative humidity

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from the frozen material using Invitrogen TRIzol.

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-5
protocol.text: RNA probes were labelled using the Ambion MessageAmp Premier.

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A).

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Axon Genepix Scanner (Genepix 4000B).

protocol.name: P-GSE40322-8
protocol.text: The data were normalized with RMA algorithm using Gene-Spring GX (version 12) default analysis settings
